# @ianwalter/renovate-config
> Ian's [Renovate][renovateUrl] config preset

[![npm page][npmImage]][npmUrl]

## Installation

```console
yarn add @ianwalter/renovate-config --dev
```

## Usage

In `package.json`:

```js
  "renovate": {
    "extends": [
      "@ianwalter"
    ]
  }
```
